promptText:
Film Fleet: A Java-based inventory system for DVD/album stores.
Addresses manual system inefficiencies in retail shops.
Automates billing, stock tracking, and customer record-keeping.
Improves accuracy, speed, and customer satisfaction.
Utilizes Java Swing, MySQL, and NetBeans IDE.
Features real-time updates, reporting, and secure logins.
Offline capability crucial for businesses without reliable internet.
Designed for small-to-medium scale DVD/album retailers.
Project fulfills academic requirements for a BCA degree.
Addresses challenges of manual inventory management.
Comprehensive analysis ensures feasibility and addresses risks.
Future scope includes online integration and mobile app.
